controls.name: KSI-MLA-4
controls.description: Perform authenticated vulnerability scanning on information resources

controlFamily.name: Monioring, Logging and Auditing
controlFamily.description: A secure cloud service offering will monitor, log, and audit all important events, activity, and changes.

ruleEvaluations.name: Guardduty is enabled
ruleEvaluations.description: Checks if Amazon GuardDuty is enabled in your AWS account and AWS Region. If you provide an AWS account for centralization, the rule evaluates the GuardDuty results in the centralized account. The rule is COMPLIANT when GuardDuty is enabled.

evidence.description: This evidence shows that all artifact storage repositories have vulnerability scanning enabled.

controls.name: KSI-TPR-4
controls.description: Monitor third party software information resources for upstream vulnerabilities, with contractual notification requirements or active monitoring services

controlFamily.name: Third Party Information Resources
controlFamily.description: A secure cloud service offering will understand, monitor, and manage supply chain risks from third-party information resources.

evidence.description: The assured workloads complianceStatus shows any active violations that apply to the workload.
